question: In which of the following situations , there will be a likely large speculative demand for money?
option1: When there is an urge among the people to speculate in stock markets
option2: When the current interest rates become very high
option3: When the current rate of interest is lower than people expect it to be in the near future
option4: When people expect the prices and goods to rise in future
answer: When the current rate of interest is lower than people expect it to be in the near future
